name: City Builder 2017 Country Mall
description:
City Builder 2017 Country Mall

You can Drive different construction vehicles, build city and feel yourself like a real construction worker with city construction 3d simulator with extra modes and more features.

Choose from variety of heavy vehicles and, drive excavator, crane, truck, bulldozer, demolition machine and many more contractor vehicle. Be the city builder with this new 3d construction simulator with supper exited new graphics and more levels. Build your city! City building contractor was never so fun and exciting; it is combination of parking and driving.

These city Builder game has many diffrent level . and after five mission if you are boring then we will give one bonus level. which level is never boring a Country builder: city mall 2017 .Bonus level is to chance to collect more Money.

City Building Contractor consists of missions you need to complete one by one. You will build real city house from the scratch using different heavy construction vehicles drive. You are new city builder in big city but don't afraid, you will get help of brigadier.

Games Features :

=> City builder games made fun again with the implementation of 8 construction vehicles!
=> Realistic control of the construction machines, optimally designed for mobile devices.
=> Huge construction sites like generator,Country mall pool, school building or town hall
=> High-quality 3D graphics
=> Doný forget to rate us or give us feedback!..
